_sText:
This is my first complete map using hammer editor, still learning new things all the time.
I wanted a zm map which had no vents or stupidly impossiable places for the zombies to reach and this is what I have came up with!

Bottom floor of the map is pretty much all rooms with the normal barricade props like the bookcase, sofa and vending machines, bottom floor gives a safe place for zombie to hide if his the only zombie with 49 cts looking for him, some nice places for the zombie to make a counter attack.

Top floor of the map is outside, bright and green, hardly any barricade props and not very surcure for lone cts, if you work as a team then you should see a few zombies dropping.
Top floor was mainly designed for hunting.

I think the design of the map will make for fast, fun and funny gameplay  without people being able to sit in a vent all day with an M3 shotgun!

This was a map I made to see if it could be put onto the server which I am admin for (id3), so is designed to take 50 players but im not sure if its really big enough yet.

I know the map is not great or amazing looking, aiming for slick gameplay.

Were a few mistakes so fixed them and changed its to v1.

V2< Design change to platforms.

v3< Added No draw textures to most of the unseen areas of the map, Added Hidden tunnel/vent so there is 3 ways up and down between the two floors, 
Made the 2 Tunnels wider so cts cannot block them, hope this will mean it will be easyier for the zombs.
Outer buildins roof is now func_breakable so to reduce camping.
wholes in the platforms for the zombie to knife through.
